programme.desc: Kirstie catches up with Catherine and Nigel, who were at a loss over what to do with their home in Larne, Northern Ireland. Catherine wanted out of their three-bed bungalow, while Nigel had fallen in love with their big garden and stunning views.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Livs dreamt of owning a holiday home on stunning Cyprus for years and is finally ready to make it happen. With a budget of £87k, can Ben Hillman make her dream come true?

programme.title: Operation Daybreak
programme.desc: In 1942 Czechoslovakia, SS-General Reinhard Heydrich is appointed to become the Reich Protector of Bohemia and Moravia. The terror and oppression that follow cause Allied authorities in London to authorise a secret mission to kill the man who has come to be known as `The Butcher of Prague. The film explores shows the operation leading up to Heydrichs death as well as the massive German reprisals that followed it.

programme.desc: Join Gethin Jones, Helen Skelton, Michelle Ackerley and the team for conversation, advice and tips to make your day that little bit easier.

programme.title: Crimewatch Live
programme.desc: Last year, a teenager suffered lifelong injuries after being hit by a speeding car. Who was the driver? And Police Scotland smash a grooming gang.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: The new owner of a terrace in Crewe isnt put off by the numerous safety bolts on the front door. The seasoned developer turns it into a smart HMO (house in multiple occupation), while a father-and-daughter team modernise a semi in Doncaster. A former estate agent takes two years to extend and transform a Gravesend house into a smart, boutique-style HMO.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: The hills of Carmarthenshire are the setting for a shopping showdown between two teams of bargain hunters, while Roo Irvine learnes about the centuries-old craft of making chain mail.

programme.title: BBC News at One
programme.desc: The latest national and international news, followed by weather.

programme.title: BBC London News
programme.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

programme.title: BBC News at One
programme.desc: The latest national and international news, followed by weather.

programme.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
programme.desc: Things take a horrible turn when one of the lead actors of a local amateur theatre show is murdered by one of the other performers.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson is on home ground in the Welsh Borders as he showcases some tempting houses to a retired couple who have a whopping £1 million to spend. Along with a characterful property, theyre after somewhere with holiday-let potential or space for a glamping business. Jules is also in his element when he meets experts in traditional construction methods who are keeping heritage building skills alive.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The team joins forces to revive a suit of armour that belonged to actor Joss Ackland. And the restoration of a pair of line dancing boots sees the experts rhythm put to the test.

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz, packed with strategy, high stakes and surprises, where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash - anything between zero and a whopping £4,000.

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Trevor Nelson for the brainy quiz where the contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else could think of.

programme.title: BBC News at Six
programme.desc: The latest national and international news, followed by weather.

programme.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

programme.title: The One Show

programme.title: Policing Paradise
programme.desc: Bermudas natural beauty is renowned around the world, and nowhere illustrates this more than Coopers Island Nature Reserve on the south east tip of the island. On duty in this ecological oasis are officers Eddie Smith and Jen Ysseldyke, but during patrol they discover a car illegally parked inside this protected area. The officers eventually find the culprit, but in the process discover Officer Smith has accidentally locked the gate to the nature reserve, leaving everyone trapped inside.

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Rafi was left with brain damage after falling seriously ill. Now he is home after a year in hospital, but his house isnt suitable - the family needs the teams help.

programme.title: Have I Got News for You
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is host, with guest panellists comedian Ross Noble and journalist Helen Lewis joining team captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop as they delve into the news.

programme.title: How Are You? Its Alan (Partridge)
programme.desc: Hosting Saudi Radio alone in a Norwich business park prompts Alan to ask the question: is solitude healthy, or do we need other people? Can dogs or technology fill the void?

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: The Peak District is Britains first national park and is about to turn 75 years old. Roma Wells travels through its crags and rolling hills, meeting the revolutionary ramblers, trail runners and, believe it or not, competitive hens to find out how it has gained a reputation as the spiritual home of free access to the countryside.

programme.title: Rick Steins Cornwall

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Alistair Appleton is in his element today as he visits the spectacular Perth and Kinross countryside, on a mission to help a young couple from Edinburgh realise their dream of a new lifestyle in a rural home. programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old twins Tai and Kenny are desperate to make their mark on the world. Thats hard when you live with your parents, and even harder when you live in Milton Keynes.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit: A Matter of Loaf and Death
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromit have opened a new bakery and business is booming, not least because a deadly Cereal Killer has murdered all the other bakers in town. Gromit is worried that they may be next but Wallace does not care as he has fallen in love.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: Evies still reeling from the message she saw on Noas phone. But when the two are left alone together, something extraordinary happens. Is it the start of a new journey for Evie?

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: While Evie throws herself headlong at life, Suz and Josh worry its too much, too soon. Meanwhile, Noa realises he has to face up to his feelings...

programme.title: Escape Room
programme.desc: Six strangers visit a mysterious building to experience the escape room, a game where players compete to solve a series of puzzles. Terror strikes when they soon learn each room is an elaborate trap thats part of a sadistic game of life or death.

programme.title: Escape Room: Tournament of Champions
programme.desc: Six people unwittingly find themselves locked in another series of escape rooms, slowly uncovering what they have in common to survive -- and discovering theyve all played the game before.

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: RuPaul makes the trip across the pond in search of the queen with the most charisma, uniqueness, nerve and talent in the United Kingdom, setting the contestants a series of challenges week by week.

programme.title: My Mates A Bad Date
programme.desc: Georgies best mate Vicky is the ultimate dating ice queen. Vickys super picky, has a long list of unrealistic criteria for her perfect match, dumps guys for using the wrong emojis, analyses everything they do and walks out of 60% of her dates.

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabena pulls out all the stops with an elaborate date to win Vanessa back, determined to remind her of what they once shared. Are they ready to re-ignite their love, or is it one final near miss?

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: When network executive Pippa makes a surprise visit on `Sin and Subterfuge, Kwabena knows it is his chance to prove he belongs in the directors chair. If the day goes well, it could catapult his career, but if it goes badly, it is game over.

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: When the long-awaited chance to direct Jamaica Road finally arrives, Kwabena must ask Simon for a favour, but at a price. With his dream within reach, Kwabena has big choices to make.

programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: The A to Z of TV Gardening
programme.desc: Carol Kirkwood explores gardening subjects that all begin with the letter D.

programme.title: Marcus Wareings Tales from a Kitchen Garden
programme.desc: Marcus develops plans to create a orchard and bring in the perfect eating apple for his favourite dessert, the classic tarte Tatin. A trip to Kent introduces him to the wide range of heritage apples available in the UK.

programme.title: See Hear
programme.desc: Marios Costi is joined by pioneering actor and director Charlotte Arrowsmith for an exploration of the world of work within the deaf community.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Political Thinking with Nick Robinson
programme.desc: Nick Robinson has a conversation with, not an interrogation of, the people who shape our political thinking about what shaped theirs.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Roman Kemp and sidekick Sarah Greene host the quiz show where contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor. Correct answers get the players moving, while wrong answers will stop them in their tracks.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: North West England: Mains and Dessert
programme.desc: The remaining three chefs from north west England compete over mains and desserts inspired by the Olympic and Paralympic Games. Who will win, and who must go home?

programme.title: Trawlermen: Hunting the Catch
programme.desc: 300,000 square miles of ocean. Three GPS-tracked voyages, filmed around the clock. One week at sea. Crabber Tydus has had a terrible year, missing months of fishing due to breakdown. With the boat finally fixed, skipper Stiggy pushes the crew to work around the clock to fill the tank with ten tonnes of crab. After covering expenses, Stiggy gambles and moves his pots further south.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: This edition of the antiques series comes from Wolverhampton Art Gallery. Experts Caroline Hawley and David Harper are on hand to value items and take them off to auction. Turning up out of the hundreds of bags and boxes is a jumble sale find that proves to be a valuable piece of jewellery.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Una Healy, Joanna Page, Jack P Shepherd and Emmanuel Sonubi test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Fleur East is on hand with more Strictly behind-the-scenes action and is joined by a trio of celebrity super fans to discuss all things ballroom. Plus more exclusive interviews with some of the remaining couples.

programme.title: Monty Dons Spanish Gardens
programme.desc: Monty travels across central Spain. He begins at the vast, imposing palace and garden of the Escorial before travelling to Madrid, Toledo, other parts of Castile and finally Valencia, visiting such gardens as a tropical garden in a railway station.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Horticulturists offer various techniques to elevate the home gardening experience, from repositioning roses in rustic layouts to planning vibrant spring displays.

programme.title: Agatha Christie Mystery Queen
programme.desc: Historian Lucy Worsley investigates the complex factors that shaped the dark imagination of a refined Devonshire lady, discovering family secrets and a childhood haunted by a sinister figure.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul and Bob set off in a punt to fish for Perch on a weir pool on the River Thames, leaving poor old terrier Ted forlorn on the river bank, as he is not allowed on the boat with them.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Highland Cops
programme.desc: On the Isle of Lewis, police hunt for suspected salmon poachers. In Glencoe, PC Stephen Cooper pursues a missing person case, and in Inverness, cops conduct drug raids in the city.

programme.title: See Hear
programme.desc: Marios Costi is joined by pioneering actor and director Charlotte Arrowsmith for an exploration of the world of work within the deaf community.

programme.title: Rob Brydons Honky Tonk Road Trip
programme.desc: Rob heads to the beating heart of country music, Nashville. He explores iconic venues like the Ryman Auditorium, goes live on-air at WSM Radio, and meets country stars old and new.

programme.title: Riot Women
programme.desc: Frazzled by demanding jobs, chaotic families, and endless spinning plates, five womens worlds smash together when they form a punk rock band to enter a local talent contest.

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: In South Wales, Nick and the team take on the task of transforming the home of Dan and his partner Anna, after a freak accident shattered their dreams of moving in together. After nearly a year in hospital, and now a wheelchair user, Dan desperately needs his terraced house to become a place where he can focus on his rehabilitation and his goal of walking again. Despite the teams tireless efforts, the house stubbornly fights back at every turn, pushing everyone to the limit.

programme.title: Cracking the Case
programme.desc: The drug-assisted crimes of one of the most prolific sexual predators UK police have seen are revealed through found footage. How did secret recordings expose the double life of rapist, Zhenhao Zou?

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: An old map, mysterious clues and ancient secrets, Mojo and Bo are after the treasure of the Knights of Swoppiton! But Preston is after it too, so they need to get there first.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Searching for a vital part of the ship that was lost during their crash-landing, Cosima and Big Lizard find Dunk stuck on a beach. They use science to save the day and make a new friend.

programme.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
programme.desc: Herbert takes his failed cooling hat invention along on a quest,using it to save the day after being faced with the Riddlemasters jibes.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky Lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a sceptre adorned with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches in gold. Before long, he uses it to steal the Lemmings chocolate.

programme.title: Pokemon Horizons: The Series
programme.sub-title: Sparkle! The Glow of Flame and Art!
programme.desc: Roys first Tera training test pits him against a familiar face - gym leader Brassius!

programme.title: Bros in Control
programme.desc: The Bros go back to school as undercover teachers but have to do as the other says! Luckily, Glow Up Star Axel is there to help disguise the Bros as Mr Longgrass and Mr Pickles.

programme.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
programme.desc: Giant is pranked by Nitro when he appears as a guest of honour at a fake school award ceremony! The other Gladiators have sneaky fun backstage at Sheffield Arena.

programme.title: Blue Peter
programme.sub-title: Bros in Control, Pranks and What Really Happens at the Airport!
programme.desc: Adam B, Callum B and Joe Tasker take on Blue Peter presenters in three bonkers battles.

programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: News magazine keeping young viewers up to date with the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

programme.title: Deadly Predators
programme.desc: Steve goes in search of the fastest Deadly Predators on earth. Using the latest CGI, Steve high-dives off a rugged cliff in Wales next to a gannet, tests the speed and accuracy of a gannet dive in a sky-high experiment in his deadly junkyard using a crane and an old caravan, and takes to the kayak for an amazing animal encounter with thousands of wild gannets.

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.desc: Guru Nanak Darbar Gurdwara, the Sikh temple in Gravesend, welcomes us for their daily morning service, including the culmination of a 48-hour continuous prayer, the Akhand Paath.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Horticulturists offer various techniques to elevate the home gardening experience, from repositioning roses in rustic layouts to planning vibrant spring displays.

programme.title: This Farming Life
programme.desc: A new family, dairy farmers the McLeans, are introduced. Raymond goes the extra mile to save his lambs. Stevie faces buffalo cow number 666, and Kirsty and Aimee take last years calves to market.

programme.title: Kelvins Big Farming Adventure
programme.desc: Rookie farmers Kelvin Fletcher and his wife Liz buy their first livestock, a flock of rare breed Cotswold sheep. Its shearing season, and Kelvin wants to find out if he can make a quick return on his investment by selling their fleeces.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Bakeation
programme.desc: Si and Dave bake a classic focaccia with rosemary by the side of an Italian Canal. Its not long before they are back on the road again, making a dash for Turin to help celebrate Italys 150th Birthday. In between, they cook a stromboli.

programme.title: Now, Voyager
programme.desc: A repressed spinsters struggles to break free from her overbearing mother and assert her independence. On the advice of a skilled psychiatrist, she embarks on a cruise, during which she finds love and self-esteem for the first time in her life. However, her new-found confidence is shaken when it is revealed her beau is a married man.

programme.title: Dark Victory
programme.desc: A socialite who learns shes dying of a brain tumour decides to squeeze a lifetime of living into one glorious summer.

programme.title: Animal Babies: First Year on Earth
programme.desc: From around three months old, the animal babies can all get around on their own, but that means the impact of their environment and the struggle to find food really begin to hit home. In California, a three-month old sea otter pup has to learn whats safe to eat in a world enmeshed with humans.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Members of the public are invited to try to make money out of their antiques.

programme.title: What Are UFOs?
programme.desc: Astrophysicists and engineers look at evidence that supports the existence of UFOs.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: Steven Spielbergs science fiction classic tells the story of an engineer who observes UFOs over Indiana and, along with hundreds of others, is drawn inexplicably to a remote mountain where scientists plan to make contact with the alien visitors. This version is the re-edited directors cut, featuring previously unseen footage.

programme.title: 40 Hits of 1985 at the BBC
programme.desc: A trip into the BBCs archives for a selection of songs from 1985, including Elton John, Duran Duran, Foreigner, Billy Ocean, Marillion, Go West, Strawberry Switchblade and Kirsty MacColl.

programme.title: The Story of Bohemian Rhapsody
programme.desc: The story behind the epic Queen single, featuring a return to Rockfield Studios by Brian May and Roger Taylor where they re-record the guitar and drum parts and explain how the song came together. Featuring exclusive rare recordings of Freddie Mercury performing the song in the studio, Queens first TV performance, the making of the video and interviews with Mercurys friends and family.

programme.title: Queen: The Legendary 1975 Concert
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve 1975, Queen crowned a glorious year with a special concert at Londons Hammersmith Odeon. This final night of their triumphant UK tour has become a legendary event in Queens history. Featuring stunning renditions of early hits `Keep Yourself Alive, `Liar and `Now Im Here alongside Brian Mays epic `Brighton Rock and a rip-roaring version of the classic `Bohemian Rhapsody.

programme.title: Queen at the BBC
programme.desc: A trip through the archives that serves up an hour of killer Queen material, featuring some of the bands greatest musical moments ever delivered to our screens. The legendary bands huge international status and punishing touring schedules meant that over the years they made surprisingly few appearances on programmes like `Top of the Pops, and tragically for their fans, several of those performances were either lost or never recorded.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: For three police recruits in Belfast, the pressure is immense. Facing criminal gangs and divided communities, they dont know who to trust.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: Bringing forensic journalism from all corners of the world by BBC Eye, the World Services critically acclaimed investigative unit, and featuring expert global correspondents getting to the heart of the biggest international stories.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.sub-title: The Hero Trap; Bird Call; Let It Bee; The Staff of Wisdom; The Snake Dance
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.desc: Moley gets in over his head at a spicy chilli eating contest, and Manny accidentally brings the chilli to life. After receiving the key to the city, Moley has such a great day that he persuades Manny to let him relive it.

programme.desc: The latest monster to terrorise Crystal Cove is a Pilgrim ghoul named Jebidiah Grim who judges the teenagers of the town for their evil deeds.

programme.sub-title: Our Boarding School:Year of the Tiger

programme.title: One Zoo Three
programme.desc: The brothers explore San Diego Zoo Safari Park and come face to face with rhinos, giraffes and the California condor. While Aaron explores the safari parks special lab, Cam has a unique opportunity to look at a California condor chick inside an egg.

programme.title: The Dengineers
programme.desc: Daisy, 8, has type one diabetes and has an insulin pump attached to her 24 hours a day. This doesnt stop her doing her favourite thing, sewing! When shes not at her sewing club, her sewing machine is out and shes designing and making her own creations... until dinner time that is! She has to pack everything away so the family can eat at the table. Daisy needs a sewing den where she can create fabulous designs in peace.

programme.title: Absolute Genius: Monster Builds
programme.desc: Dick and Dom enter the world of engineering against floods, wind and earthquakes. In the Netherlands they see how coastal defences keeps the sea at bay, put earthquake proofing to the test and tackle gale-force winds.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: This episode follows Winston Churchill from a young soldier in India during the time of Queen Victoria, through the First World War, to victory in World War II, and finally to his retirement in the Swinging Sixties. Meanwhile across the world, meet the American soldier literally spreading propaganda around the battlefields, and learn about Gandhis more eccentric side.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Flop hear the familiar jingle of Gillys ice-cream van and race across the park to find her. After a long run, Bing finally gets his ice cream but as he waves goodbye to Gilly he tips the ice cream out of the cone. Its too late to call Gilly back so Flop makes a fruit cone instead.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po follow a trail of flowers that leads them to some very special treasure.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea learns of Supertatos greatest weakness - jelly - and uses it against him.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits Theatre, its the speedy dancing runner beans, who wont stand still for even one minute.

programme.title: Tee and Mo
programme.desc: Mo is very excited by the arrival of a new lamp and Tee is more interested in the box.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Its vaccination day! Bing knows it might hurt a little but he is looking forward to the special shiny Hoppity Voosh sticker he will get from Doctor Molly. Bing is brave, but when he goes to get his sticker after his vaccination, he finds out that there are none left! Bing is upset- but then Pando mistakes Bings disappointment for pain, and Doctor Bing has to help.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Purple is the host of a fun game show called name that colour, with Pink and Brown playing along as contestants.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Enid the cat is stuck up the tree. How will Duggee and the Squirrels get her down?

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum, so Duggee and the Squirrels need to do some detective work to reunite them with their real mum.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal cars wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Mum reminisces about Bluey and Judo as babies. Bluey learnt to roll over first, but Judo was the first to crawl, so then it became a race to see who was going to walk first.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: When the Go Jetters find the Grimbots shipping overripe tomatoes into the Spanish town of Bunol, they put a stop to whatever Glitch is up to - until they find out that the tomatoes were destined for the famous Tomatina Festival, the biggest food fight in the world. Can the Go Jetters fix their own glitch and save the festival?

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Bird Trap
programme.desc: When Mr Tods efforts to creep up on the rabbits are thwarted by a noisy song thrush, he cages the bird so that he can ambush Peter and his friends without warning.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: When Selva encounters an injured creature, Peso journeys to provide medical aid.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: Who will win the Numberblocks bowling tournament?

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: U gets the balloon ride of his life, but hes still unhappy - or so he thinks! When unhappy U meets perky P, things can only go one way - up. Now Us only problem is getting back down.

programme.title: Nick Copes Popcast
programme.sub-title: Dont Be Scared of the Dark
programme.desc: Norman is scared of the dark and cant get to sleep. Can Nick and the Popcasters find a song to help him snuggle down?

programme.title: Justins House
programme.desc: Justin and Robert get given some very pongy cheese, but the horrible smell makes Little Monster run away and attracts the attention of Funella Furchester and a very cheeky mouse.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing gets jealous when Sula pays more attention to Pando on a play date. As he feels more and more left out, Bing tries to get Sulas attention and spoils Sulas tea party. Sula pushes Bing and they both end up angry. Amma shows them a way to get rid of all their anger so the toy party can continue.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Yakka Dee! celebrates children communicating - because talking fills you up with whizz, pop, bang! In this episode, Dee encourages a friend to say lion and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see what lions look like and what they do. Theres a big lion, a baby lion, a roaring lion and a handsome lion. Theres a lion on a cupcake, a lion on a doorknocker and a lion playing hide and seek! A sleeping lion, a leaping lion and a lion that Dee loves.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.desc: The bugs go ahead and start jumping on a squeaky toy without any intention of stopping until it breaks.

programme.title: Piggy Builders
programme.desc: Reg asks the Piggies to put on a show for the Bunnies. Cesar builds a stage, while Cornelia and Charlie gather performer. They decide it will be a circus show. In the end, the Piggies are clowns transforming the stage into a big top!

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos are at a childs birthday party. They watch an adult hide a bag of chocolate gold coins for a treasure hunt. The Twirlywoos try to look at the coins, but they are interrupted by children coming in to search for them.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: George from the CBeebies House helps Justin and his friends put on a big concert with the BBC Philharmonic. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble tries his hand at conducting an orchestra.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: It is night time and the Teletubbies are all sleeping, apart from Tinky Winky. Stepping outside, Tinky Winky sees a star in the sky which sings Twinkle Twinkle.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome babies Marta, Billie, Hud, Elijah, Thomas, Finley and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Parents, carers and their babies at home are invited to join in with all the fun activities too! Inside Giovannas bag is a rubber duck, and all the parents and babies have different bath toys in their bags which are explored through discovery, play, song and story.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Maddie and Triggs are staging an epic show in the garden for Mum, but Dad keeps interrupting their performance with his noisy DIY. What is he building in that shed?

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan the dinosaur expert wants to discover dinosaur bones, but assembling them into a dinosaur-shape is a lot harder than finding them!

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Kiri and Lou decide to take Pania a giant fruit for a present. But as they bring it to her, they cant resist having a taste of it, and another, and another.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey struggles to learn how to ride her bike, but finds inspiration when she watches her friends determination with their own tasks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels have an exciting adventure woodland ahead of them. While the Squirrels fuel up with important breakfasts, Rolys family are still trying to wake him up. Only the promise of breakfast will do the trick.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers arrive on a planet populated by strange cactus-shaped aliens.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Tomato performing his mind-boggling magic act, if Kiwi ever stops interrupting him with his questions.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Osbourne helps the class to make their own scarecrow. Mittens, meanwhile, proudly shows off the shiny new bell on her collar, but is inconsolable when later it goes missing. Timmy hears a faint ringing sound in the garden, and the hunt is on to find the missing bell.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: George and Freddie plan a woodland adventure. They create a list of all the things theyd like to see and find and pack some snacks for their intrepid journey. On their adventure with Mum and Dad, they discover colourful leaves.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Siennas dad is from Nigeria and he has taught her a unique way of making Nigerian Jollof rice. Sienna asks her friends to try tasting fresh thyme, which is one of the ingredients in her Jollof rice, before they come round for a special Nigerian meal. No one is at all keen on the taste of the thyme, but Sienna is confident that she can change their minds when they try some of her food.

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Benjamin and his brothers want to find out about teeny tiny creatures that crawl - caterpillars. Chantelle meets Ezzie to find out how caterpillars grow and change into cocoons and chrysalis.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?
programme.desc: Organist Ashley shows his organ shoes, which help him to play the pedals on the floor.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: The class arrives wearing brightly coloured clothes for a fun-filled activity day. Theres a colourful science experiment and a colour safari adventure around the school.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Motorbike rider Grace shows off three amazing steam machines. Grace drives a paddle steamer around a river, shows off the super-fast Inspiration land speed car and then drives an old steam car.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `tiger and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see a big tiger, a baby tiger, a stripy tiger and a growling tiger. We meet a swimming tiger, a climbing tiger, a cheeky tiger and even a tiger at a tea party! The journey is repeated with some surprises along the way and everyone has a boogie when Dees friend finally succeeds in saying todays word!

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.sub-title: Now We Are Six to Ten
programme.desc: Are you sitting comfortably? Then well begin a bedtime story all about Numberblocks Six to Ten. Learn all about the numbers 6, 7, 8, 9 and 10 with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: OI, OR and UR are in a coin-rolling, cork-popping, wave-surfing mad dash to prove who is the fastest! This episode introduces the-oi-, -or- and -ur- digraphs and the words join, coin, cork, surf, turf, cord, corn and end.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: The Three Bears are making a mess of their breakfast. Can the Wonderblocks help?

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: The Colourblocks discover a series of colour wheels. Learn which colours go next to each other with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Happy has always loved the water, even though it makes a mess. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water. On Happys first day, his mum drops him off and he is excited. He goes to play with Norrie and Roly and has loads of fun baking, playing with toys and jumping over puddles, but Happy cant do it.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: TapTaps sister, TipTop, comes for a visit and amazes Yukee with her drumming skills. She is deaf, and she drums just as well as TapTap, making Yukee wonder how she does it. With TipTops help, Yukee learns how to feel the music.

programme.title: Something Special

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies have lots of fun playing inside and outside Home Dome. They wave to the Tiddlytubbies from inside and outside. In Tummy Tales, a girl helps her dad take wet washing from inside to hang up outside to dry.

programme.title: Andys Safari Adventures
programme.desc: When Jen accidentally grinds up some giraffe thorn tree seeds that Mr Hammond wanted Andy to plant, Andy must head to the Namibian desert in southern Africa to track some down. And what better way to do that than from the top of a giraffe itself! But when another male giraffe arrives on the scene, a fight ensues, and Andy is caught in the middle.

programme.sub-title: And the Dish Ran Away With the Spoon
programme.desc: Niles and Daphne discover that there is a heavy price to pay for admitting their true love. Among those ranged against the lovers are Daphnes jilted groom Donny and Niles bitter wife Mel.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier asks Martin to tour a retirement home so he can get closer to its manager.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasiers new boss buys a condo in Frasiers building and then copies his interior design.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chef and restaurateur Marcus Samuelsson goes undercover at a public cooking class, a culinary institute, a high-end food truck and a soup kitchen to find and mentor new culinary talent.

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A couple running a guesthouse in Portugal welcome their first trial visitors. In Italy two vineyard owners begin harvesting their grapes by hand. Plus: wedding bells in Spain.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole, Simon OBrien and Max McMurdo travel across the UK to find unique items lost in peoples homes to fix up for a profit. This episode features vintage motor oil bottles.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Ade Adepitan in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lucys been thinking about buying a property abroad since the age of 16 and is now ready to take the plunge. Jean Johansson shows her what Málaga has to offer for her £100k.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Its a happy ending as Louise and Pauls village nears completion and Tracey and Budo finish their kitchen. And Ben and Susanas plans for their Spanish village move up a gear.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: On payment day, the BandBers clash over furniture failings and clock complaints. And sparks fly, rather ironically, over a lack of electricity.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Knives, forks and popping corks... were celebrating 20 years! In Glasgow, Bernadette hopes to impress with her Italian-themed menu, but a fishy feud leaves a bad taste.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Moto GP fan Jackie and her daughter Tayla want a holiday home in rural Valencia, Spain, for £150k. Will any of Jean Johanssons wow-factor villas or rustic retreats get their hearts racing?

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: An Extra Slice
programme.desc: Tom Davis, Amy Gledhill and Scarlette Douglas enjoy an egg-stra dollop of Meringue Week. Who suffered souffle dismay? And whose stiff peaks impressed this week?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britains sharpest armchair critics share more of their sharp, insightful, passionate and sometimes emotional critiques of the weeks biggest and best shows on television.

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker make a welcome return to our screens. Offering their unmatched satirical insight into current world events, Adam, Josh and Alex are joined live in the studio by comedians Frank Skinner and Stevie Martin.

programme.title: Greg Davies: Firing Cheeseballs at a Dog
programme.desc: Can a chance encounter with a stray Spanish dog and a bag of crisps lead to an epiphany and a fresh approach to life? Of course it cant, but is that a reason not to build an entire show around it? This show is the first to ever attempt to chronicle an entire life without offering even the slightest insight into the human condition, every significant incident forensically removed to leave only the lean meat of the trivial.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: The adventure of a teen gang against a bunch of alien monsters in a South London project. All hell breaks loose when teenage hoodlums led by Moses try to mug a woman named Sam, whos walking home from work and suddenly a strange object crashes into a car.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay tries to help two inexperienced restaurant owners who run an Italian eatery called Casa Roma in Lancaster, Calif.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its `Viva España in Wigan as the competition kicks off with first host, hospital theatre practitioner Geoff Conway, who is attempting to wow his guests with an epic nine-course tapas feast.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Wigan, the second host is 27-year-old hairdressing salon owner Natalie Crompton. Natalie loves a party and she has high hopes for a fun-filled evening, with some very special treats in store for her guests.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Wigan, music teacher and funeral singer Alan Gregory attempts the performance of a lifetime with an evening of what he hopes will be great Greek grub. His plans for a cultured soiree are soon ransacked by straight talking Geoff Conway.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Wigan, music teacher and funeral singer Alan Gregory attempts the performance of a lifetime with an evening of what he hopes will be great Greek grub. His plans for a cultured soiree are soon ransacked by straight talking Geoff Conway.

programme.title: Naina
programme.desc: After losing both her parents and her sight in a car crash at a young age, Naina Shah is brought up by her grandmother. Years later, she has an operation to cure her blindness, but begins to see strange things.

programme.title: Chamatkar
programme.desc: Sunder loses everything, he seeks refuge in a graveyard, where he befriends a ghost.

programme.title: Auzaar
programme.desc: Two college friends find themselves on the opposite side of the law when they reunite.

programme.title: Trial Period
programme.desc: PD, an educated and unemployed man, serves a trial period of 30 days as Romis parent due to his demand for a new father to his mother, Anamaya Roy Choudhary.

programme.title: Shabaash Mithu
programme.desc: The tumultuous and challenging life of former Test and ODI captain of India womens national cricket team, Mithali Raj.

programme.title: Veer-Zaara
programme.desc: Squadron Leader Veer Pratap Singh, a pilot in the Indian air force, rescues the stranded Zaara, a woman from Pakistan, following a bus accident, and their lives are forever bound. With all the ingredients of a classic love story, the film is a tale of love, separation, courage and sacrifice that unfolds over 22 years.

programme.title: Agneepath
programme.desc: A young boys father is lynched before his eyes. Fifteen years later he returns home for revenge.

programme.title: Cinebuzz
programme.desc: The host interviews various media personalities, shares the latest news of the Bollywood industry and reviews the newest movies.

programme.title: Kambakkht Ishq
programme.desc: In Hollywood, a chauvinistic stuntman and a glamorous surgeon and sometime model share a love-hate relationship.

programme.sub-title: The One With the Soap Opera Party

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys make scenes while stealing tips from the tip jar at a pizza shop, and then go through a hilarious text exchange challenge at the food court.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys conduct interviews for DNA testing and cause mischief at the grocery store while wearing bath robes. Also, the big loser cracks under pressure during a presentation at a childrens museum.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Following a run-in with a bull, Robert is in a foul mood, and Debra decides to get to the heart of the matter.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Rays attempts to help alleviate Debras PMT only make things worse.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Still reeling from his run-in with a bull, Robert loses his nerve at work and decides on a career change to something safer - telemarketing.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Out at dinner, the Barones run into Roberts ex-wife, who makes a surprising proposal.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike suggests the staff undergo drug testing in support of the mayors anti-drug campaign, but he has a problem when he accidentally ingests peyote while visiting a Native American chief.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: The mayor longs to have the same effect on his constituency as the pope does during a visit to the city.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: During bachelor and bachelorette parties for Paul and Claudia, Mike spots an obscene statue that was commissioned for the city.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike tries to find the right way to break up with his fanatical new girlfriend; Carter and Stuart invest in a nightclub.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Princess Leia Fantasy
programme.desc: Monica is distraught after her break-up with Richard. Phoebe unsuccessfully tries to raise her spirits, but ultimately its Mr Geller who comforts his daughter. Elsewhere, Chandler and Janice begin seeing each other again and Joey cant stand it. The two plan a day of fun to try to overcome Joeys aversions for Chandlers sake. Meanwhile, Rachel tells Phoebe and Monica about Rosss Princess Leia fantasy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where No Ones Ready
programme.desc: In a race against the clock, Ross tries to get the gang dressed and ready for a black-tie benefit at the museum.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica decides the best way to get over Richard is to keep herself busy. She develops a `jam plan, hoping the distraction of cooking will divert her attention. After making jars and jars of jam Monica decides she still wants to have a baby, so she begins searching for a sperm donor, and comes across Joeys file. Elsewhere, Phoebe is mistakenly stalked by a man who thinks shes Ursula, and Chandler receives dating advice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Metaphorical Tunnel
programme.desc: Ross panics when he sees his son with a Barbie doll, and Chandlers fear of commitment surfaces in his relationship with Janice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes attempts to introduce her visiting half brother Frank Jr to the delights of city life leave him thinking that she works in a brothel. Meanwhile, Ross lists five famous women that he would like to date. To his surprise, actress Isabella Rossellini, one of the women he rejected while narrowing down his list, pops in to Central Perk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When Janice asks whether any of the friends have ever dated one another the gang has a flashback to three years ago (one year before the pilot was supposed to have happened) when everyones lives were beginning to come together. Phoebe moves out of Monicas apartment, Chandler searches for a new roommate - ending up with Joey, Monica bumps into Rachel, and Ross learns that Carol is a lesbian.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Race Car Bed
programme.desc: When Monica buys a new bed from the Mattress King, the wrong one is delivered. Meanwhile, Joey sees Janice kissing her husband, and Rachels father clashes with Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Giant Poking Device
programme.desc: Chandler and Janice reach a turning point in their relationship, while Monica accidentally injures Ben and tries to hide it from Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, the friends form teams and play American football. Ross and Monica relive their sibling rivalry by going head-to-head as opposing team captains. Rachel is upset that Ross didnt choose her for his team, and Joey tries to outwit his foe Chandler. Meanwhile, the turkey is left stewing while the losing team calls for a rematch.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel wonders if shell ever get another job after she quits Central Perk, Joeys new job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, and Ross accidentally breaks a little girls leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Cant Remember Which Sister
programme.desc: Ross is suspicious about Rachels possible job offer from a good-looking stranger, while Chandler cant remember which of Joeys many attractive sisters he kissed at a party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Jealousy
programme.desc: Ross becomes increasingly jealous of Rachels sexy new colleague, Mark, and gets the wrong end of the stick when he spies on Rachel at her office. Meanwhile, Monica is enamoured with a sexy busboy who writes love poems for her, and Joey gets himself into trouble by faking his CV in order to get a part in a Broadway musical.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Monica and Richard Are Just Friends
programme.desc: Monica bumps into Richard in a video store and they decide to work on their friendship, but the more time they spend together, the more sexual their relationship becomes. Meanwhile, Phoebe dates an athlete who unintentionally keeps exposing himself by wearing loose shorts, and Rachel agrees to read `The Shining if Joey will read `Little Women.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe is reunited with her former singing partner, Leslie, a failed television commercial jingle writer who wants to use Phoebes signature song `Smelly Cat in an advertisement for cat litter. Meanwhile, Ross becomes jealous when Rachel agrees to go to a fashion lecture with Mark, a former colleague who has just left for a new job, and Chandler meets a beautiful woman, Ginger, who has a prosthetic leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel Take a Break
programme.desc: Rachels job prevents her from celebrating her anniversary with Ross. Wanting more time to focus on her new job, she suggests the two take a break from their relationship. Convinced that Rachel has dumped him for one of her workmates, Ross hooks up with a woman from the copy shop that Joey and Chandler have been after.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross tries to prevent Rachel from learning his disturbing secret. Meanwhile, Monica, Phoebe, Chandler and Joey spend a night eavesdropping.

programme.desc: Featuring music from Irish rockers Snow Patrol and stand-up from Kerry Godliman. Also, presenter Alan Carr bravely hands his phone over, and `Greatest Dancer judge Oti Mabuse and TV presenter Anthea Turner join Michael to play the Midnight Gameshow.

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head
programme.desc: Butt-Head blows off Beaviss ear and tries to reattach it. Beavis and Butt-Head think Beavis has died and is now a ghost.

programme.title: EDtv
programme.desc: A director of a failing cable channel who comes up with the idea of just broadcasting one persons life, 24 hours-a-day. The chosen subject is video store worker Ed and the show becomes a hit, but with it comes problems: he falls for his brothers girl, and his dad reappears and tensions grow between him and his mother. Somehow, Ed has to get the show cancelled to get his life back.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Following a run-in with a bull, Robert is in a foul mood, and Debra decides to get to the heart of the matter.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Rays attempts to help alleviate Debras PMT only make things worse.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Still reeling from his run-in with a bull, Robert loses his nerve at work and decides on a career change to something safer - telemarketing.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Out at dinner, the Barones run into Roberts ex-wife, who makes a surprising proposal.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike suggests the staff undergo drug testing in support of the mayors anti-drug campaign, but he has a problem when he accidentally ingests peyote while visiting a Native American chief.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: The mayor longs to have the same effect on his constituency as the pope does during a visit to the city.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: During bachelor and bachelorette parties for Paul and Claudia, Mike spots an obscene statue that was commissioned for the city.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike tries to find the right way to break up with his fanatical new girlfriend; Carter and Stuart invest in a nightclub.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Princess Leia Fantasy
programme.desc: Monica is distraught after her break-up with Richard. Phoebe unsuccessfully tries to raise her spirits, but ultimately its Mr Geller who comforts his daughter. Elsewhere, Chandler and Janice begin seeing each other again and Joey cant stand it. The two plan a day of fun to try to overcome Joeys aversions for Chandlers sake. Meanwhile, Rachel tells Phoebe and Monica about Rosss Princess Leia fantasy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where No Ones Ready
programme.desc: In a race against the clock, Ross tries to get the gang dressed and ready for a black-tie benefit at the museum.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica decides the best way to get over Richard is to keep herself busy. She develops a `jam plan, hoping the distraction of cooking will divert her attention. After making jars and jars of jam Monica decides she still wants to have a baby, so she begins searching for a sperm donor, and comes across Joeys file. Elsewhere, Phoebe is mistakenly stalked by a man who thinks shes Ursula, and Chandler receives dating advice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Metaphorical Tunnel
programme.desc: Ross panics when he sees his son with a Barbie doll, and Chandlers fear of commitment surfaces in his relationship with Janice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes attempts to introduce her visiting half brother Frank Jr to the delights of city life leave him thinking that she works in a brothel. Meanwhile, Ross lists five famous women that he would like to date. To his surprise, actress Isabella Rossellini, one of the women he rejected while narrowing down his list, pops in to Central Perk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When Janice asks whether any of the friends have ever dated one another the gang has a flashback to three years ago (one year before the pilot was supposed to have happened) when everyones lives were beginning to come together. Phoebe moves out of Monicas apartment, Chandler searches for a new roommate - ending up with Joey, Monica bumps into Rachel, and Ross learns that Carol is a lesbian.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Race Car Bed
programme.desc: When Monica buys a new bed from the Mattress King, the wrong one is delivered. Meanwhile, Joey sees Janice kissing her husband, and Rachels father clashes with Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Giant Poking Device
programme.desc: Chandler and Janice reach a turning point in their relationship, while Monica accidentally injures Ben and tries to hide it from Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, the friends form teams and play American football. Ross and Monica relive their sibling rivalry by going head-to-head as opposing team captains. Rachel is upset that Ross didnt choose her for his team, and Joey tries to outwit his foe Chandler. Meanwhile, the turkey is left stewing while the losing team calls for a rematch.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel wonders if shell ever get another job after she quits Central Perk, Joeys new job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, and Ross accidentally breaks a little girls leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Cant Remember Which Sister
programme.desc: Ross is suspicious about Rachels possible job offer from a good-looking stranger, while Chandler cant remember which of Joeys many attractive sisters he kissed at a party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Jealousy
programme.desc: Ross becomes increasingly jealous of Rachels sexy new colleague, Mark, and gets the wrong end of the stick when he spies on Rachel at her office. Meanwhile, Monica is enamoured with a sexy busboy who writes love poems for her, and Joey gets himself into trouble by faking his CV in order to get a part in a Broadway musical.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Monica and Richard Are Just Friends
programme.desc: Monica bumps into Richard in a video store and they decide to work on their friendship, but the more time they spend together, the more sexual their relationship becomes. Meanwhile, Phoebe dates an athlete who unintentionally keeps exposing himself by wearing loose shorts, and Rachel agrees to read `The Shining if Joey will read `Little Women.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe is reunited with her former singing partner, Leslie, a failed television commercial jingle writer who wants to use Phoebes signature song `Smelly Cat in an advertisement for cat litter. Meanwhile, Ross becomes jealous when Rachel agrees to go to a fashion lecture with Mark, a former colleague who has just left for a new job, and Chandler meets a beautiful woman, Ginger, who has a prosthetic leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel Take a Break
programme.desc: Rachels job prevents her from celebrating her anniversary with Ross. Wanting more time to focus on her new job, she suggests the two take a break from their relationship. Convinced that Rachel has dumped him for one of her workmates, Ross hooks up with a woman from the copy shop that Joey and Chandler have been after.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross tries to prevent Rachel from learning his disturbing secret. Meanwhile, Monica, Phoebe, Chandler and Joey spend a night eavesdropping.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.desc: When Homer discovers that the Springfield Elementary canteen meets his dietary needs, he becomes a third wheel in the school lives of Bart and Lisa.

programme.title: San Demetrio, London
programme.desc: Based on a real event, this stirring adaptation of F Tennyson Jesses official account tells how a group of lowly British Merchant Navy sailors saved the San Demetrio oil tanker after it was almost destroyed by the enemy, braving fire and ocean to sail the vessel 900 miles to the safety of a Scottish port.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle

programme.title: The Iron Petticoat
programme.desc: A humourless Russian, Captain Vinka Kovelenko, defects from her home country. Major Chuck Lockwood is assigned to show her the bright lights of London while she tries to convince him of the superiority of communism. Naturally, the two opposites fall in love but then must contend with the KGB, who are not happy with the idea of one of their officers running around free in London.

programme.title: Turner and Hooch
programme.desc: Turner is a meticulously groomed, excruciatingly well-organised detective working in a small California coastal town. When local character John McIntyre is murdered by drug smugglers, the only witness is McIntyres slobbery, smelly mutt Hooch. Turner, who despises dogs in general and Hooch in particular, is compelled to put the cantankerous dog up as his house guest.

programme.title: Anna

programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. programme.desc: Sensing the chance to get some bargains, Drew checks in on some contacts who are downsizing and selling off collections. In Norwich, he finds a beautiful Victorian umbrella stand.

programme.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea
programme.desc: Newly married couple Peter and Anne plan to move to south Devon, with a budget of £1.2 million to buy a home with sea views and a separate annexe for Annes physiotherapy practice.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit

programme.title: Salvage Hunters

programme.title: Salvage Hunters

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team perform house clearances and uncover hidden gems. What will these antiques sell for at auction?

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus is asked to help with an emotional house clearance in Stockton-on-Tees. Later, he is invited to examine the work of two semi-professional artists to see what their work might be worth.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: A recently retired woman wants to declutter her home and raise money to visit her family abroad. Angus travels to Horsforth to dig through her collection, in order to see what hidden gems she may have.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Paul Laidlaw and Margie Cooper embark upon the first leg of their brand new road trip. The experts kick off in Penzance and make their way through scenic Cornwall before going head to head at an auction in Liskeard.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Its the second leg of the road trip for antiques experts Paul Laidlaw and Margie Cooper. After a disheartening first auction, Margie has a lot of catching up to do, but will her fortunes change as the experts head for an auction in Exeter?

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts Paul Laidlaw and Margie Cooper kick off the third leg of their road trip in Chippenham. Margie learns about the beginnings of modern photography and Paul discovers the fascinating history of Farleigh Hungerford Castle.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: After a very successful auction, antiques experts Paul Laidlaw and Margie Cooper kick off leg four of their road trip in south Wales and make their way across country for a penultimate auction showdown in Llandeilo.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Paul Laidlaw and Margie Cooper begin the last day of their road trip in Newport, before heading to auction in Newent. Paul is in the lead but Margie is snapping at his heels. Who will go on to win as they go head-to-head at the final auction?

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex is in Cornwall after receiving a cry for help from The Northshore. After a drop in occupancy and unorthodox living scenarios have the owners in despair, Alex tries to re-vamp this tired hostel.

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex finds her way to Spanhoe Lodge in Northamptonshire, where an unexplained crash in guests has forced them to turn to The Hotel Inspector for help to solve their tumbling occupancy.

programme.title: Cornwall Air 999
programme.desc: The countys air ambulance is called to a pedestrian hit by a car and a critically ill cardiac case. Plus, a woman suffers a freak accident.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: First through the barn doors is a vintage ride-on toy that has seen better days. Metal maestro Dominic Chinea cannot wait to get to work on Sammy the Snail, who is beaten up and rusted after years of enthusiastic use by owner Hannah and her four brothers. Keen to revive Sammy for the next generation, Dom is delighted to discover his original colours.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Resident antique photography expert Brenton West brings his expertise to bear on a camera that survived the First World War but hasnt taken a picture in over a hundred years, while leather expert Suzie adds a surprise touch that leaves the cameras owner Phil lost for words.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Jay Blades and the team bring four treasured family heirlooms, and the memories they hold, back to life. Metal expert Dominic Chinea and wood restorer Will Kirk join forces to work on a very special wooden travelling trunk. It contained all the worldy possessions of a family of Polish refugees as they travelled across continents looking for a new home after the Second World War, eventually arriving in Britain aboard the Empire Windrush in 1948.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Daniel and Claire believe renovations on their home have stirred a residual energy. The team investigate whether Claire has a demonic attachment, and if there is anything they can do to rid the house of the Demon.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A pair of transit policemen decide to raid a New York subway train loaded with money. Foster brothers John and Charlie have held a lifelong fantasy of robbing the networks money train, which collects millions of dollars each night from the citys subway stations. In addition to trying to deceive their boss, the boys must also contend with a beautiful new decoy cop.

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Garan is part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that theyre the ones being hunted.

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: When two cops witness an assassination attempt, a ruthless crime boss orders Gabriel Tancredi, an ex-Marine turned mob enforcer, to eliminate any and all threats.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Diana, princess of the Amazons, is raised to be an unconquerable warrior on a sheltered island paradise. She discovers her full powers and true destiny after leaving home to join the fight to end all wars.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.desc: A beautiful princess falls in love with a prince from another land, but an exiled magician who wants her for himself conjures up a spell to transform her into a swan. Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: A family of ducks decides to leave the safety of a New England pond for an adventurous trip to Jamaica. However, their well-laid plans quickly go awry when they get lost and wind up in New York City.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Teen Titans GO! to the Movies
programme.desc: With a few madcap ideas and a song in their hearts, the Teen Titans head to Hollywood to fulfill their dreams. Things soon go awry, however, when a supervillain plans to take over the planet, putting the very fate of the young heroes on the line.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.
