programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: A man returns home to Cleveland for his mothers funeral, where he must confront his grief, reconnect with estranged family members, and forge new relationships.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter and a servant. They seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how the crime was committed.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower mans mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers whos doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesnt download in 24 hours, hell die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after whats in his head.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Jack Torrance takes a job as the winter caretaker at the ominous, mountain-locked Overlook Hotel so that he can write in peace. When he arrives there with his wife and son, they learn that the previous caretaker had gone mad. Slowly Jack becomes possessed by the evil, demonic presence in the hotel.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: Retelling of the classic horror tale about Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince who is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Draculas castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harkers fiancee, Mina, the image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement, a former baseball player moves into a new house with his wife and two children. Soon, a dark secret from the homes past unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror.

programme.title: 47 Meters Down
programme.desc: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico become trapped in a shark cage on the ocean floor. As their oxygen starts to run out and with great white sharks circling them, the sisters must find a way to get to the surface alive.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: 47 Meters Down
programme.desc: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico become trapped in a shark cage on the ocean floor. As their oxygen starts to run out and with great white sharks circling them, the sisters must find a way to get to the surface alive.

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, a couple protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Everton, Howards Way
programme.desc: The definitive story of Everton at the peak of their powers in the mid-1980s, when they became the best side in the land. They won the FA Cup, thrashed Man Utd 5-0, beat Liverpool home and away, and then strolled to the league title with a record amount of points. This is the tale of a man with Everton in his blood and a team intent on greatness, all told by the heroes who helped make it history.

programme.title: Man on Wire
programme.desc: On August 7th 1974, at 7.15am, 24-year-old Frenchman Philippe Petit stepped off the edge of the South Tower of New Yorks World Trade Centre. Armed only with a balancing pole and intense determination, he walked out onto a single suspended wire and `danced for 45 minutes while balancing a quarter of a mile above the pavement below. The is the intimate story of Petit and his group of friends as they followed their dream.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are under strict instructions to keep clean for Madame Au Laits town photograph, but this proves difficult when the rest of the town need their help with some messy jobs. So when its Photo Time, they are covered in mud, compost and feathers.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Talluah are determined to throw a magnificent party for McCoggins birthday. They get everyone involved and have fun organising the decorations, music and food, but Chikidee gets stuck in a giant cake and rolls around causing chaos.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah are trying to make everyone laugh, but McCoggins is not responding. programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy is desperate to get the hang of the game of Whackerty so that he can compete in the town tournament. Everyone has different and unusual playing styles, but when he tries to copy them the results are disastrous. Somehow he must develop his own style to win.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tickety legend has it that McCoggins is building an amazing model of the clockhouse out of lollipop sticks. No one has seen it yet and the whole town is waiting for the grand unveiling, but when McCoggins asks Tommy and Tallulah to help him finish his model, the twins accidentally smash it.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah have such fun with their new friend Larry the Bug that they decide to adopt him as a pet, but just as they finish making him a home, Larry flies away! After spending the day chasing him all over town, they are surprised to discover that Larry has a family of cute little baby bugs.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah enlist Battersby as their star performer for Show Time. Unfortunately, the magic trick they devise for him doesnt go to plan and soon Madame Au Lait is stuck down Hopparoos portable hole. Tallulahs trumpet is also trapped and she needs it for Chime Time.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Whale Trip

Hercule points out all manner of sights and sounds as they ride on Thelma the whale, but the boisterous puffins dont always listen to Hercule, and frequently interrupt the poor walrus. The puffins soon learn how important it is to listen to your elders when out on a trip.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Jimjameree Tree

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane

programme.desc: Exploring the life and crimes of American serial killer William `Bill Suff.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: A blind woman gets a running mate and a pack of dogs protect rhinos in Kenya. Meanwhile, a Border Collie protects visitors in Glacier National Park.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand
programme.desc: Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: Gangs Of Baboon Falls
programme.desc: Look back at how the gangs have fared throughout a bizarre year of lockdown and return to normal.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A visit from the vet awaits one of the parks strangest residents, while the small monkey team lose the battle to save tragic marmoset Koba, who had been taken out of the pet trade.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison looks forward to the prospect of baboons being at the park, while recently arrived marmoset Clyde, rescued from the pet trade, braves the great outdoors for the first time.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: Dogs are using their remarkable scenting skills for lifesaving conservation and pro-active environmental policing. In Canada, a team of canine detectives is sniffing out the destructive invasive zebra mussel.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand
programme.desc: New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the teams solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend whos ready to fly.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Julz and park scout Simon track the Kakuli pack who they filmed previously, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. The Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Encountering an elephant as Julz and Henry track the Kakumbi pups who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. ZCPs lion specialist Thandie Mweetwa counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: The Kakumbi see a leopard whos been stalking them, Julz goes fishing with Simon, explores mealtime pack hierarchy and witnesses a heartbreaking vigil for a badly injured Kakumbi pup.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride
programme.desc: Heading back to the den with the Kakumbi who are mourning the loss of two pups. A look at a hyena den and lion pride trying to take down a buffalo and catching up with the Manzi who are in a standoff with a leopard and a herd of angry elephants.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: Ethiopias Awash National Park is home to a closely knit group where aggression plays a vital role in ensuring strong family bonds and structure. Their daily challenges with each other and the environment of Awash give way to a fascinating society.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough journeys across the globe to discover how the earliest animals developed on our planet. Attenborough meets expert fossil hunters, and sees on-site some of the most remarkable finds that have transformed our understanding of the first animal life forms, including the first set of eyes and teeth and the first predators and parasites.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenboroughs journey continues in Canadas Rocky Mountains, where fossils document an explosion in animal diversity never seen before or since. programme.title: Monkey Life

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison responds to a request from the police to rescue a neglected marmoset. The siamang gibbons have a training session and its pumpkins in the mist for the chimps.

programme.sub-title: United States Grand Prix: Sprint Qualifying
programme.desc: The United States Grand Prix stages the fourth Sprint Qualifying session of 2025 as grid positions are set for the F1 Sprint Race, where the fastest driver here will claim pole.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. programme.sub-title: Daycare Assault?!; Landlord Lodging Drama; Child Support Squandered by Mother?!; Plastic Surgery Purge
programme.desc: Fight breaks out when a day care owner tries to collect payment. A landlord says he lowered rent in exchange for being able to sleep over. Ex-sister-in-law says a woman spent child support on herself. A low-wage earner says she lent a friend $6000.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Moms Million Dollar Settlement!; Stucco Job From Hell!
programme.desc: When a woman comes into money, she offers to help her truck-driving daughter with her bills and expects to be paid back. A dissatisfied customer offers up three videos as evidence that his contractor did a lousy job.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A man tells police he shot an intruder who had attacked and murdered his wife. Four years later, new forensic evidence leads police to re-examine the motives of this so-called hero.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a man accused of shooting his estranged wife insists she killed herself, investigators must decide if the victims death was suicide or cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Fire fighters find an entire family dead inside their burned-out home, and at first glance, it appears to be a case of murder-suicide. But clues found at the scene soon lead investigators to believe otherwise.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion
programme.desc: In February 1972, police are called to the home of Bryce and Virginia Durham, where they find the couple and their son strangled and partially submerged in their bathtub.

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion
programme.desc: A late winter snowstorm blankets Syracuse, New York, and in the aftermath, a young womans life is violently taken. Detectives must use a forensic meteorologist to help unlock the mystery.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Two witnesses who watched a woman gunned down in her Florida home by someone in a clown costume speak out for the first time on network television.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Detectives employ the latest sonic technology to solve the baffling case of a union official who was executed in his home shortly after a strike.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A man tells police he shot an intruder who had attacked and murdered his wife. Four years later, new forensic evidence leads police to re-examine the motives of this so-called hero.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a man accused of shooting his estranged wife insists she killed herself, investigators must decide if the victims death was suicide or cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Fire fighters find an entire family dead inside their burned-out home, and at first glance, it appears to be a case of murder-suicide. But clues found at the scene soon lead investigators to believe otherwise.

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion
programme.desc: When two teenage boys go missing during a hot summer, a shocking tip sends detectives on a search in brutal temperatures. Will the heat prove to be an ally in their investigation?

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion
programme.desc: A man goes missing from a small beach community in New York right when Superstorm Sandy engulfs the eastern United States.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A wealthy lawyer shoots his wife from the backseat of a car - was it a tragic accident or cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The homicide of a gay couple leads investigators into the twisted world of White supremacists. Can paint chips and an analysis of glass shards help catch the murder?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Police discover a man shot dead in his home after they receive a call from his worried mother. Can clues from a rare gun and the victims beloved dog help solve the case?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A TV news producer is murdered in her apartment. Police identify two suspects, but both are cleared of wrongdoing. Can a DNA data bank help catch the killer?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Police are dispatched to a shooting and discover the dead victims husband is one of their own. Did the policemans wife accidentally shoot herself in the head?

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Defective Pug Puppy?!; Salvaged Car Fraud?!
programme.desc: A dog breeder is accused of filing a retaliatory restraining order after a client called the attorney general to complain about her puppys medical condition. A woman sues her mechanic for fraud when her cars repair bill exceeds its purchase price.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: I Only Fear God and Judge Judy!; Fake Dreadlocks Disaster?!
programme.desc: A US Marine goes out of his way to help a homeless man only to be sued by him for changing the locks on his own home. A woman says a stylists attempt at fake dreadlocks resulted in pain and hair loss.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Sister Brother Breakdown!; Neighborhood Hit and Run!
programme.desc: A woman allows her brother to rent-to-own her home but then she decides to move back in and sue him for rent, damages, and allegedly stolen property. A woman and her son say they witnessed their van being backed into by a neighbour.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Eyelash and Tanning Business Bust?!; Surprise Evidence!
programme.desc: A man demands payback for a business loan from a woman who claims he sent indecent pictures and threatened to kill her. A woman stands corrected after insisting that she never put her utility bill in her cousins name.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman leaves her children in the backseat of her car in an attempt to seek child support so that she can afford to buy diapers. Her actions have lead to a nasty fight with her ex lover.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Family Movers and the Police Chase!
programme.desc: A woman regrets hiring family friends to help with a move when her vehicle is involved in a police chase and work hours are disputed.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A teenager accuses his landscaping boss of stealing money from his bank account, but his boss claims he was fired after being verbally abusive to his wife. A woman claims she paid more than $4,000 for a landscaping job that was never even started.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Bully or Best Friend?; Gather Round for Judge Judys Driving Class!
programme.desc: A loving mother explains her teen sons inability to understand how a "friend" could steal from him. After a terrible accident totals two cars, the judge shares some tips on how to deal with the rush-hour traffic.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Mothers to the Rescue of Adult Children!; Traffic Circle Mishap!
programme.desc: Two families fight over duelling restraining orders after sons get into trouble with the law for drug possession. An uninsured motorist tries to blame a fellow driver for her accident.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: When departure from an apartment doesnt work out according to a tenants plan, he is accused of ratting out his landlord to the city.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman says movers damaged her prized lamp from Paris. A man lets his ex-roommates know that it was not acceptable for them to become romantically involved after they all moved in together.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Crying Jag Over Family Money; Surgery Craziness?!; Ghost Dating Heartache!
programme.desc: A woman breaks down while describing how her niece takes advantage of her elderly mother. A man expects the judge to believe that his insurance company advised him to pay for knee surgery in cash. A woman explains a non-exclusive relationship.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: The Diamond Quiz Show?!; Basketball Team Hotel Rip-Off?!; High-End Shoes or Stinky Sneakers?
programme.desc: A diamond expert and his ex-wife feud over gems. A basketball player pays thousands in hotel charges for her teammates, only to learn that she must recoup the money herself. A business associate sues for breach of contract in a sneaker deal.

programme.title: Judge Judy

programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Steered by his late 19th-century Appletons guidebook, Michael Portillo continues through southern California aboard the Coast Starlight rail service. In the historic port of Monterey, Michael raises the Bear Flag of the one-time Republic of California and above it, the Stars and Stripes. He discovers the citys Spanish and Mexican heritage and traces how the former fishing port described as `stinking and decrepit in John Steinbecks novel, `Cannery Row, has become a beacon for tourists.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo strikes oil in the suburbs of Los Angeles, contemplates his navel in the orange groves of Riverside, makes a California roll and paints a pretty picture in Laguna Beach. It is Mexican Independence Day and the locals are celebrating the countrys hard-won independence from Spain in the early 19th century.
